block.mishanguc.tooltip.road_with_straig: The straight line is in the direction of player's forward direction.
block.mishanguc.tooltip.road_with_angle_: The inner side of the right angle is towards the player's forward direction.
The part of the right corner that is more nearly parallel with players eyesight direction
is located at the middle line, while the other part is offset.
block.mishanguc.tooltip.road_with_auto_l: It will be converted to proper road block when there is a block update.
You can manually trigger it by clicking the top of it.
block.mishanguc.tooltip.road_with_joint_: The half straight line of the road points to the direction of player's forward direction.
block.mishanguc.tooltip.road_with_offset: The line is offset to the left, or when sneaking, to the right.

item.mishanguc.road_connection_state_deb: Click on the road to get line information
item.mishanguc.id_checker_tool.tooltip.1: Get its id data when clicking block.
item.mishanguc.fast_building_tool.toolti: Can quickly place or destroy multiple blocks on a plane.
Hold Shift or Alt and scroll mouse wheel to switch matching mode.
item.mishanguc.force_placing_tool.toolti: Force to place a block without triggering block update.
Also used to break a block without triggering block update.
Can be used to place and remove fluids.
item.mishanguc.data_tag_tool.tooltip: Can get the NBT data of blocks and entities.
item.mishanguc.block_state_tool.tooltip: Click the block to get the block state.
Can get the fluid state while sneaking.
item.mishanguc.text_copy_tool.message.su: Successfully copied %1$s rows of text of the block.
item.mishanguc.text_copy_tool.message.fa: Cannot paste texts as the NBT of the item is wrong!
Cannot paste texts as no text is yet copied. Please hold this item and click %s to copy texts.
Unexpected error was thrown when pasting text.
Ths block you clicked is not supported. Supported blocks include vanilla sign blocks, hung sign blocks and wall sign blocks.
The %s side of this block can not have texts. Valid sides are %s and %s.
item.mishanguc.text_copy_tool.message.wa: Some rows are skipped as a vanilla sign only accepts 4 lines.
item.mishanguc.text_copy_tool.message.su: Successfully pasted %1$s rows of text on the block.
item.mishanguc.text_copy_tool.message.wa: Some colors are ignored, as a sign only supports one color.
Some colors are ignored, as a sign only supports limited number of colors.
debug.mishanguc.notRoad: This is not a road block
debug.mishanguc.roadConnectionState: The connection state of road at %s at %s side:
debug.mishanguc.roadConnectionState.allD: The connection state of road at %s:
debug.mishanguc.id.name: §7Name: §r%s
debug.mishanguc.blockStates.none: The %s located at %1$s has no properties.
debug.mishanguc.dataTag.block.null: The %2$s located at %1$s has no data tags
debug.mishanguc.dataTag.block.header: The %2$s located at %1$s has the following data tags:
debug.mishanguc.dataTag.entity.entity: The %2$s located at %1$s has the following data tags:
debug.mishanguc.nbt.compound_display_ful: Click to display the full tag
debug.mishanguc.nbt.list_display_full: Click to display the full list
notice.mishanguc.load: Thank you for installing Mishang Urban Construction mod. This mod is under test, and currently used for experiencing new features. Before this mod is formally released, DO NOT use the features of this mod in your formal works, as the features may be renamed or removed in future versions.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.mishanguc: An amount of blocks and items that make a beautiful city! Currently not stable. Please do not use in your formal work!
You cannot edit this sign as %s is editing it now.
message.mishanguc.shade.description: May cause rendering error. Not recommended to turn on.
message.mishanguc.moveUp.description: Move the current text field up. Does not affect their displaying unless you rearrange after moving.
message.mishanguc.moveDown.description: Move the current text field down. Does not affect their displaying unless you rearrange after moving.
message.mishanguc.rearrange.tooltip: Adjust the horizontal offsets of contents.
message.mishanguc.clear.description: Clear all texts. Cannot be undone!
message.mishanguc.clear.confirm.descript: Click again to clear all text. Cannot be undone!
message.mishanguc.add_first_text: Click here to add first text!
message.mishanguc.absolute.description: In absolute mode, rearranging texts will ignore this line.
message.mishanguc.absolute.param: Absolute: %s (if on, rearranging texts will ignore this line)
message.mishanguc.flip.description: Flip the offset and alignment of the current text in the left-right direction. Hold 'Ctrl' to flip all texts.
